item.description:
Join NHCer Debi playing Trivia on Wednesdays!

O'Tooles is an excellent establishment with great food and delicious beverages, holding Trivia every Wednesday Night! Come join the excitement as we take first place with your help! Or you can just come to hang out and drink some good Irish beer. Either way, please show up to Register by 8:00.

Debi will Host, you can reach her at 203-824-5300 if you have any questions.  She will attempt to hang some signs to help you find the group.

If other groups your in would like to cross-post please feel free to do so, but contact Debi to let her know.

The manager, Colin has offered to set aside some prime tables and is offering the following specials:

Trivia drink specials

$4 well drinks
$4.50 cabernet and Pinot grigio glasses
$3 domestic drafts

Trivia food specials (all items $5)

Chicken sliders
Chicken Parmesan sliders
O'Toole's nachos
Pots of gold potato skins
Cheese burger sliders
Buffalo chicken wings
Sausage bites

 

Looking for Parking?
Street - Orange, Court, and Chapel have metered street parking with some also on State and Elm an extra block over. (~$1.50/hr)
Garage -The Garage at 360 State Street is very close, enter down the ramp on State between Court and Chapel.  If you pay close attention to how you are leaving then there is an exit dirrectly out onto Pitkin Plaza, which O'Toole's borders on.  Otherwise it's just around the other side of the block.  (It's pricier though, I don't remember how much.)
item.how_to_find_us: Debi will host, her contact info is in the description.
item.name: Trivia at O'Tooles (12/12)
